paper_abstract: A labeling of vertices of a benzenoid system B is proposed that reflects the graph distance in B and is significantly shorter than the labeling obtained from a hypercube embedding of B. The new labeling corresponds to an embedding of B into the integer lattice Z(d) and is shown to be optimal for all practical purposes. A coordinatization algorithm is presented and it is demonstrated that it can be easily carried out by hand.
paper_title: THE LATTICE DIMENSION OF BENZENOID SYSTEMS
